issue.title: [Java] Delete useless class DiffFunction
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7152](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7152). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`DiffFunction` was used in the initial implementation of visitors, since currently visitors logic has been refactored and this class no longer useful.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7152?focusedCommentId=16973962) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5817
